Title: SAS Ultimate Guide to Combat: How to Fight and Survive in Modern Warfare
Author: রবার্ট স্টার্লিং
Summary: This title teaches the reader how to fight and survive war in the 21st century from the tools of the trade to avoiding getting shot or blown-up from surviving an interrogation to defending a position. This is not a book for the faint hearted but then neither is war.
Book_Title: SAS Ultimate Guide to Combat: How to Fight and Survive in Modern Warfare
